爞字的基本解释

爞
chóng
〔爞爞〕熏烤，如“自冬及春暮，不雨旱爞爞。”
旱热之气：“时又吐旱火之爞融。”

爞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chóng］
［《廣韻》直弓切，平東，澄。］
［《廣韻》徒冬切，平冬，定。］
热气。参见“爞爞”、“爞融”。

爞字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　爞； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页687第34
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?徒冬切，音彤。【玉篇】熏也熱也。【廣韻】旱熱也。【集韻】或作蟲。　又【廣韻】直弓切。【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】持中切，?音蟲。義同。【爾雅·釋訓】爞爞，炎炎，熏也。【疏】大雅雲漢云：蘊隆蟲蟲。爞，蟲音義同。【爾雅】或省作烛。通作蟲。又【集韻】徒東切，音同。本作烔。或作燑。詳烔字註。◎按爾雅釋文本音同。

爞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
爞字的起名意思

暂无。

爞
Basic explanation of words
爞
chóng
〔爞爞爞爞爞爞, such as "since winter and spring evening, no rain and drought will 爞爞."
The air of drought and heat: "The heat of drought and fire is spit out from time to time."
爞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chóng］
["Guangyun" straight bow cut, flat east, clear. ]
["Guangyun" Tu Dongqie, Pingdong, Ding. ]
heat. See "爞爞", "爞爞ong".
爞
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　爞; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 687 34
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Tu Dongqie, Yintong. [Jade articles] Smoked is also hot. [Guangyun] Drought and hot too. [Jiyun] or as insects.　[Guangyun] Straight bow cut. 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】Cut in the middle,? Soundworm. The same meaning. 【Erya·Shixun】爞爞, Yan Yan, Xun Ye. [Sparse] Dayayun Hanyun: Yunlong insects.爞, insects have the same sound and meaning. [Erya] Or province as a candle. Pass as a bug. Also 【Jiyun】to east cut, with the same sound. This is a 烔. Or make a fire. Detailed note of the word 烔. ◎According to Erya, the text has the same pronunciation.
